Uses of Interface
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.normalizer.RegionNormalizer

Packages that use RegionNormalizer
Package
Description
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.normalizer
The Region Normalizer subsystem is responsible for coaxing all the regions in a table toward a "normal" size, according to their storefile size.
